text: Vincent Gauthier-Manuel (born 6 April 1986) is a skier from France. He has a disability. He skied at the 2011 IPC Alpine Skiing World Championships and was the second skier to finish in the standing men's downhill race. He was the second skier to finish in the men's standing Super-G race. He was the first skier to finish in the men's standing Super Combined race and the slalom race. ==References== Category:French skiers Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:French sportspeople with disabilities
title: Vincent Gauthier-Manuel
